data.text: Duniɲa rakolon i xili sɛnbɛma ra,
I bara kaabanakoe raba naxee bara muxu tɛrɛnna,
Yi fe mɔɔli mu kolonxi sinden.
I fa nɛ mixi malide naxee tinma tinxinyi ra,
Muxu birin bara findi mixi sɛniyɛntare ra.
Kɔnɔ mixi yo mu na muxu ya ma naxan i xilima,
Kɔnɔ yakɔsi, Muxu Marigi, Muxu Baba,
I naxa xɔnɔ muxu ma Marigi.
I xa taa sɛniyɛnxie bara findi gbengberen yire ra,
i xa hɔrɔmɔbanxi muxu nu sɛɛwaxi naxan na,
Na birin kui, i tondixi muxu malide?
